nodes.text: An underwater village on the planet Sedri was home to a group of Sedrian separatists in 3 ABY, months after the Sedri civil war. It was attacked and massacred by a Black Sun–affiliated team of mercenaries in that year, who were searching for the stolen Barani List in the nearby underwater caves. When a rival group of Black Sun–affiliated smugglers arrived at the village, they were attacked by four Sedrian survivors, who later joined their side in a battle against the mercenaries.
